snippet: The company, which specializes in communications for emergency workers, has taken a $1 billion investment from the private equity firm.
abstract: Motorola Solutions, maker of public safety communications equipment, will announce $1 billion investment from private equity firm Silver Lake; choice of Silver Lake comes as company seeks to transition away from specialized radios to a broader emergency communications platform.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The company, which specializes in communications for emergency workers, has taken a $1 billion investment from the private equity firm.

headline.main: Motorola Solutions Chooses Silver Lake to Help Fund Transition Away From Radios
headline.print_headline: Motorola Solutions Chooses Silver Lake to Help Fund Transition Away From Radios
